message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you take $30. It's a good offer for you to start with.
I think we can do better than that.  How about a 60/40 split in my favor?  We can both get a good amount of money this way.
Bob, my friend, we're running out of time!  My last offer was generous, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. 65/35, let's do this and avoid losing out completely.
Alice, I understand we're running out of time, but I need to get a better deal.  Let's split it 70/30 in my favor.  I think this is fair considering the inflation that's happening.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. The value is disappearing fast!  60/40 is my final offer.  Take it or leave it!
